Question
========
The Executive Board of VU University Amsterdam wants to know whether the
number of enrollments per study program is related to the gender of the
student. For this, she bases herself on the number of registrations of
the male and female gender in four different study courses. Which
statistical technique or test is the most suitable for this analysis?

Answerlist
----------
* One sample t-test
* Independent t-test
* Chi-square test
* Multiple regression

Solution
========





It is a chi square test, as you have a categorical variable.  
If you want to know more about the chi square test, watch this
[clip](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=izw6vGctckA&index=2&list=PLyLpEs0x9BnkqWS0k674CckSeAeJ4A3W7)
